title: IModeler.ReplaceSurfaces
description: Replaces the surfaces of the given faces.
signature:

   System.Int32
NFaces
,
   System.Object
FaceArray
,
   System.Object
NewSurfArray
,
   System.Object
SenseArray
,
   System.Double
Tolerance
)
